item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:25 Chances: Analysts have identified CNH Industrial NV as one of the 13 most promising low-cost stocks. The company’s partnership with the Catholic University of Cordoba to educate Argentina’s next generation of farmers demonstrates a commitment to future growth and development. CNH’s recent awards for farming innovations and success at the Farm Machine 2024 awards showcase the company’s strong position in the agricultural industry.
